column3: na Pasur ba Gedalia
column5: na Malkia ba Pasur tsee nsɛm a Jeremia kaa kyerɛɛ ɔman no nyina
column9: Nyia ɔbɛtsena kurow yi mu no
column12: na ɔyardɔm ano: na nyia obefir edzi akɔ Kaldeafo nkyɛn no dze
column14: na no nkwa bɛyɛ no dɛ afonam

column3: Wɔdze kurow yi bɛhyɛ Babilɔnhen no dɔm nsa ara ampa

column2: "Nna asafohen no see ɔhen no dɛ
column3: Yɛserɛ wo
column4: Ma wonku ɔbarimba yi: susuampaara dɛ ɔgow akofo a wɔaka wɔ kurow yi mu nsa
column6: wɔ dɛ ɔka dɛm nsɛm yi kyerɛ hɔn ntsi: na ɔbarimba yi ɔnnhwehwɛ ɔman yi ne yie

column3: Hwɛ
column4: ɔwɔ hom nsamu: na nnyɛ ɔhen nye nyia obotum ayɛ biribi etsia hom."

column3: na wɔkotoow no kyeen ɔhenba Malkia mona efiadze a ɔwɔ aweɔmfo abanguado no mu: na wɔdze ntampehoma gyaagyaa Jeremia siaan mu. Na mona efiadze no hɔ nnyi nsu
column4: dɛ adɛtsebir nko: na Jeremia homee kɔr adɛtsebir no mu."

column3: opianyi a ɔwɔ ahemfie no
column4: tsee dɛ wɔdze Jeremia akɔto mona efiadze no
column5: nna ɔhen no so tse Benjamin ɔponkɛse mu no
column12: mbarimba yi abɔ mbusu wɔ dza wɔdze ayɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi Jeremia no nyina
column13: dɛ wɔakɔtow no akyen mona efiadze no mu; na ɔkɔm ntsi ɔreyɛ oewu wɔ mbrɛ ɔwɔ no: osiandɛ edziban bi nnyi kurow no mu bio."

column3: dɛ
column4: Fa mbarimba eduasa fi ha ka wo ho
column5: na keyi nkɔnhyɛnyi Jeremia fi mona efiadze no mu

column2: "Nna Ebed-melek faa mbarimba no kaa no ho
column3: na ɔkɔr ahemfie adzekoradan no ase
column4: na ɔkɛfaa ntangow dadaw a atsetsew na esusuw
column5: na ɔdze ntampehoma kyekyeree gyaagyaa mu siaan mona efiadze no mu maa Jeremia."

column3: Fa ntangow dadaw a atsetsew na esusuw no hyehyɛ w’ambɔtoadze wɔ ntampehoma no ase. Na Jeremia yɛɛ dɛm."

column2: "Nna wɔdze ntampehoma no twee Jeremia baa sor
column3: na woyii no fii mona efiadze no mu: na Jeremia tsenaa aweɔmfo abangua no mu."

column2: "Nna ɔhen Zedekia somae ma wɔkɛfaa nkɔnhyɛnyi Jeremia baa ne nkyɛn wɔ EWURADZE fie abow a otsia ebiasa no ano: na ɔhen no see Jeremia dɛ
column3: Miribebisa wo asɛm bi; na mma nnsiw me biribiara do."
Aso mepaa mu ka kyerɛ wo a
column4: ana nnyɛ oku ara na woboku me bi? Na sɛ mema wo apam a

column2: "Nna Zedekia kaa ntam nsumaa mu kyerɛɛ Jeremia
column3: dɛ
column4: Dɛ EWURADZE a ɔyɛɛ hɛn kra yi tse ase yi
column6: eso meremmfa wo nhyɛ mbarimba yi a wɔrohwehwɛ wo nkwa yi nsamu."

column3: Mbrɛ EWURADZE dɔm Nyankopɔn
column5: ɔse nye yi: Sɛ ibefir edzi akɔ Babilɔnhen n’asafohen no nkyɛn a
column6: nkyɛ ɔnodze wo kra bɛtsena ase
column8: wɔnnkɛfa gya ahyew no; na ɔwo na wo fifo bɛtsena ase:"

column2: "na sɛ irimmfi edzi nnkɔ Babilɔnhen n’asafohemfo no nkyɛn a
column3: ɔnodze wɔdze kurow yi bɛhyɛ Kaldeafo nsa
column5: na ɔwoara so irimmfi hɔn nsa mfi."

column3: Musuro Judafo a wɔadan kɔ Kaldeafo no nkyɛn no
column4: bi a wobeyi me ahyɛ hɔn nsa

column3: Wonnkeyi wo ama. Meserɛ wo ara
column4: tsie EWURADZE ne ndze wɔ dza mereka kyerɛ wo yi mu: dɛm na obesi wo yie

column2: "Na sɛ epow dɛ ibefir edzi akɔ a
column3: asɛm a EWURADZE dze akyerɛ me nye yi:"
mbaa a wɔaka wɔ Judahen ne fie nyina wɔdze hɔn befir edzi akɔ Babilɔnhen n’asafohen no nkyɛn
column6: na woedzi wo do nyim: afei a w’anan atɔ adɛtsebir mu yi

column2: "Na wɔdze wo yernom na wo mba nyinara befir edzi akɔ Kaldeafo nkyɛn: na ɔwoara nnkefi hɔn nsa efi
column3: na mbom Babilɔnhen ne nsa bɛka wo: na ɔwoara na ebɛma wɔdze gya ahyew kurow yi."
Mma nyimpa biara nntse asɛm yi

column2: "Na iyi sɛ asafohen no tse dɛ menye wo akasa a
column3: na wɔba wo nkyɛn
column5: Afei ka dza aka akyerɛ ɔhen no kyerɛ hɛn; mma nnsiw hɛn biribiara do
column6: na yerunnku wo: eso dza ɔhen kaa kyerɛɛ wo no

column3: Mo nkotoserɛ na medze koguu ɔhen no enyim
column4: dɛ mma ɔmma me nnsan nnkɔ Jonatan fie munnkowu wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Nna asafohen no nyinara baa Jeremia nkyɛn bebisaa no: na ɔkaa nsɛm yi a ɔhen no hyɛɛ no no nyinara kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛmara. Nna wogyaa dɛ wɔnye no kasa; osiandɛ woennhu asɛm no."
"Nna Jeremia tsenaa aweɔmfo abangua no mu ara dze kodur dɛ wɔgyee Jerusalɛm."
